name: pitch (itch) (Canslp)
description:
PITCH is a suspenseful abstract puzzle-platformer

it is a standard first-person game- you can look, walk, jump, and interact with the mouse, space, and WASD. alternate controls are available from the options menu.

this game starts small and becomes bigger and more difficult. you can skip any level, or jump to any new level, from the select menu. there are no locked levels, but you must beat the last level to finish the game.

PITCH is not a horror game, but there are scary elements. there are no formal jumpscares, but scary things may happen suddenly- or appear abruptly- as a result of puzzle failure. usually you will know when one of these puzzle elements is present, but it may be tense or suspenseful. this game is visually very minimalistic, so things are generally scary in behavior only

thank you for playing pitch!
